field.note: Defines the name of the question group

section.name: Score Categories
section.note: Score ranges can be categorised in this section, by specifying a category name and a score range. For example: A range named "Low" may correspond to a Question Group score of between 0 and 10 points. The score ranges are inclusive and can be closed (eg; between 0 and 10) or open-ended (eg; 10 or higher) - this is achieved by omitting a number from the open end of the score range.

section.name: Score Categories: Supplementary Content
section.note: Supplementary content related to Score Categories (specified above) can be provided in this section. This content is intended as a general overview of the score obtained for the Question Group upon completion of the Quiz. A keyword is provided in the "Thank You" bodycopy to print the applicable content for the Group.
